text: "Angie" is a 1973 song by The Rolling Stones and was taken from their 11th studio album Goats Head Soup. It went to number 5 in the United Kingdom, number 1 in the United States, Australia, Canada, Belgium, Italy, France, Norway, the Netherlands and Switzerland, number 2 in South Africa, New Zealand and Germany and number 9 in Ireland. ==References== Category:1973 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:The Rolling Stones songs Category:Tori Amos songs Category:Soft rock songs Category:Glam rock songs
title: Angie (song)
